channel.title: veroboard on SynthDIY Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in veroboard on SynthDIY Wiki

item.title: ADSR(-ish) envelope generator
item.description: This is a simple but effective envelope generator designed by Moritz Klein in his video. It approximates an ADSR by mixing together a short +12V peak and an attenuated version of the input signal and then feeding them into a capacitor through 2 diodes and potentiomters.

item.title: MS-20 Filter
item.description: The MS-20 is a synthesizer made by Korg and it has a pretty nice sounding filter. Ren√© Schmitz has made a popular clone of it and has schematics avavailable on his site.
